content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math> be a vector-valued function with <math alttext="f of 0 equals, open angled bracket, negative 2 comma 3, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>0</mn></mpadded><mo>)</mo><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mo>⟨</mo><mpadded><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mpadded><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mpadded><mo>⟩</mo></mpadded></mpadded></math>. If the instantaneous rate of change of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi></math> with respect to <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="open angled bracket, 3 t squared, plus 4 t, plus 1, comma, 2 t cubed, plus t, minus 2, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>⟨</mo><mpadded><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace height="2.4ex"></mspace></mpadded><mo>⟩</mo></mpadded></math>, what is <math alttext="f of 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>f</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mn>1</mn></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open angled bracket, 2 comma 2, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>⟨</mo><mpadded><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mpadded><mo>⟩</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, 4 comma negative 1, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>⟨</mo><mpadded><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded></mpadded><mo>⟩</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, 8 comma 10, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>⟨</mo><mpadded><mn>8</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>10</mn></mpadded><mo>⟩</mo></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="open angled bracket, 10 comma 7, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>⟨</mo><mpadded><mn>10</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>7</mn></mpadded><mo>⟩</mo></mpadded></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open angled bracket, 2 comma 2, close angled bracket" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>⟨</mo><mpadded><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mpadded><mo>⟩</mo></mpadded></math>

unit.text: 9: Parametric Equations, Polar Coordinates, and Vector-Valued Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
